overview.content: Nothing says 'home' quite like a white picket fence. Our vinyl picket and ranch rail options give you that timeless curb appeal with absolutely zero maintenance‚Äîno painting, no rotting, no hassle.

styles.name: Traditional Picket
styles.description: Classic pointed-top pickets. The timeless American look for front yards and decorative boundaries.

styles.name: Scalloped Picket
styles.description: Curved top rail creates elegant waves along the fence line. Perfect for garden borders.

styles.name: Ranch Rail

styles.name: Post & Rail

faqs.question: Will a white vinyl fence turn yellow?
faqs.answer: No. Our Homeland vinyl is manufactured with titanium dioxide UV stabilizers that prevent yellowing and fading. The white stays bright for decades.

faqs.question: Is vinyl picket fence good for pets?
faqs.answer: Traditional picket spacing doesn't contain small pets. For pet containment, consider adding wire mesh behind the pickets or choosing a privacy style instead.

faqs.question: How tall should a front yard fence be?
faqs.answer: Most Toledo neighborhoods allow 3-4 feet in front yards (open style required). Check with your HOA and review our permits page for local regulations.

faqs.question: Can vinyl ranch rail replace wood split rail?
faqs.answer: Yes! Vinyl ranch rail gives you the same open, country aesthetic as wood split rail but with zero maintenance and a lifetime warranty.
